name: Real Wrestling Revolution 3d - World Wrestler Game
name_original: Real Wrestling Revolution 3d - World Wrestler Game
description:
Real Wrestling Revolution 3d - World Wrestler Game

You Like fighting and boxing games? You cant ignore this wrestling.... Real Wrestling Revolution 3d is road to world Champions. It is free to play best combat sport game with multiple wrestlers, game modes and customization. Become a pro wrestler champion in this wrestling entertaining game.

Game is especially designed for wrestle mania fighting and wrestling lovers. Game has two free modes.
A wrestling superstar career challenges will drive you to take risky shots in the ring.
Upgrade your wrestler to enjoy the professional experience with no limits of time.
Knockout mode puts the power, intensity, and excitement of royal wrestling fighting in your device.

Real Wrestling Revolution 3d Game Features

Multiple male and female wrestlers.
Different fighting styles.
Super & Ultimate wrestling knockout mode.
Authentic actions and realistic wrestling moves
Career Mode to fight with world wrestlers
3D animations and realistic quality sound

Lets us know how do you like this game.
Enjoy
